:mod:`pylossmap.blm_type_map`
=============================

.. py:module:: pylossmap.blm_type_map

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   BLM name to type mapping.



Module Contents
---------------


.. data:: TYPE_MAP
   

   

.. function:: name_to_type(name, on_fail='other')

   Converts find the type corresponding a given BLM name.

   :param name: BLM name.
   :type name: str
   :param on_fail: returned if not BLM type is found.
   :type on_fail: str, optional

   :returns: the BLM type or "on_fail" if no BLM type is found.
   :rtype: str
